website_summaries.verdict: Choose this anchor if portability is your top concern and you prefer a basic, affordable model for occasional use.
pros: Folding 3.5-pound anchor is lightweight yet effective and easy to transport
Includes marker buoy and durable storage bag
Great for small kayaks and use in slow-moving water
cons: The 25-foot line may not be sufficient for some consumers' needs
Longevity is somewhat questionable, as the anchor is prone to developing rust

customer_reviews.title: Less than one year old and only used in freshwater ...
customer_reviews.text: Less than one year old and only used in freshwater. The thing got rust and fell apart. It's an anchor it's not suppose to rust to the point of only functioning for about 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Nandin

customer_reviews.title: Stops boats. Which is what anchors do.
customer_reviews.text: Seems odd that Light Weight would be a review item on an anchor. Aaaanyways, this is a beautifully packaged design. The padded bag is a great feature as it keeps the anchor from making a ton of racket in the boat. There is a lock ring that keeps the anchor prongs open or closed. I found that only opening one or two would allow me to slowly drift and fish longer runs. The rope is soft and definitely strong enough for the task. The thickness makes it easy to weigh anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Ruth Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice little anchor for kayak
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this solely to use with my kayak. Has served me well so far. I like how it folds out and then back in. Sometimes I wish it came with something to wrap it around so it didn't deploy the entire thing but that's a mod I'll have to do.
customer_reviews.author: KalEl28

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered two of these anchors, one for my wife's kayak and one for mine. When the shipment was delivered I only received one. I promptly contacted the seller via email and within three days I received the other anchor. I have not used the anchors yet but they were exactly as advertised and the price was reasonable. This review is to compliment the outstanding customer service. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great design lightweight good grip. Holding power for my inflatable.
customer_reviews.author: Janos Sz.

customer_reviews.title: Great little anchor in nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Packs away in a nice padded bag. Nice and compact. Held my 800 lbs Seadoo Wakes in a fairly good current. Anchors dug in and the skis stayed put. Definitely recommend this. An anchor is a Must-Have for anyone on a PWC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept me steady and on fish - see pics
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it I caught one, positioned and tossed anchor, adjusted trolley for wind and soon caught another. Haven't seen anyone else this evening catch a thing.
customer_reviews.author: JESSE STUHR

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and the anchor is just as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the anchor exactly what I wanted, this seller was able to change my shipping address after they already had created a shipping label. You can get an anchor from many places but this company has really got their act together. Thanks a million!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: It’s an anchor and I use it in my kayak . I have also used it when float tubing while fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Crissandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my dingy and the lined bag keeps it from banging boat very nice
customer_reviews.author: handfree

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best product I bought for my ISUP. I am able to fish without floating across the lake with this! Super easy to use and install
customer_reviews.author: Max Richards

customer_reviews.title: Anchors away!
customer_reviews.text: Great anchor. Works perfect for anchoring 2 kayaks on the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Craigasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Holds me in place on my kayak in light wind on the bay
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect a lot because this is a very lightweight small anchor
customer_reviews.author: bobbo

customer_reviews.title: Works well, low quality
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this anchor, the black bag it comes with came damaged with tears on it. I took it out to the a local bay & it worked well, however the anchor is already showing signs of rust . After the very first use. I rinsed it with water after using it in the saltwater too. Works well, but low quality and shipped damaged.
customer_reviews.author: k kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Good anchor bad float.
customer_reviews.text: manufacturering issue I assume. The seam wasn't sealed on the float.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Great Cary pouch to take along Great for kayak , sup Good value Bought 3!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact anchor
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a small anchor that would hold the boat on breezy days. This one fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and is easy to stow and transport! Worked well to tether our jet ski to shore while camping this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Vandenberg

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I tried putting the pieces of this together separately and the cost was at least double. worked for me even in a good tide holding my aqua shoes in place while i kite boarded
customer_reviews.author: John Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Compact kit. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set. Holding my Sea Doo well in normal conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cost
customer_reviews.text: as advertised. quick delivery. thought it may be rubber coated but was only painted. (was not advertised as rubber coated)
customer_reviews.author: lee jumbelic

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best there is.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best kayak anchor out there. Rope, bouoy, clip are all pre-tied so there's no questioning how good your knots are.
customer_reviews.author: Cheap Angler Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Nothing difficult about it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and make sure to replace the line.
customer_reviews.author: Silverking80

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my kayak the carabiner makes it easy to hook on anything
customer_reviews.author: pedro

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work in sand, bought it for my jet ski and it doesn’t hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Bullet Anchor
customer_reviews.text: These are great anchors. Just make sure before sending down in water to wiggle the ring lock so the blades spin out.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great little anchor-used in high wind with a kayak
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this! We used it with our kayak in shallow water in high wind. Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together anchor. Can't wait to hit the water.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great personal anchor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to attach to my blow-up flotation. Love, love, love it! Attach anchor to flotation and I'm care free to relax in the lake and not worry that I'm in the middle of the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Dpopp4805

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: For years I have had a big heavy anchor for my canoe. I decided to try this item because it was smaller but looked like it would hold well. It works way better than my last anchor. I did put longer rope on it though.
customer_reviews.author: flyfish59102
